name: Report on the Death of Robert Evergreen
name_original: Report on the Death of Robert Evergreen
description:
This is our DIGITAL DEMO.

Report on the Death of Robert Evergreen is a journalism game that blends physical and digital media to emulate the experience of being an Editor in Chief in the 1990’s.

You play as a newly-hired editor in chief working for a newspaper called The Local Rag in the early 1990s. Your goal is to bring the local rag into a successful state again. By listening to physical cassette tapes of interviews of Robert’s family, friends, and associates, and then after observing writers notes, you are deciding between several options on a digital interface, you get to decide how Robert’s life and death will be portrayed in the headline article of tomorrow’s newspaper
